title: Ebyafaayo mu bufunze eby'Obuyiiya mu Bbanga - Orbital Temple
heading: Ebyafaayo mu bufunze eby’Obuyiiya mu Bbanga
intro: Okuva lwe yasooka okusimbulwa obulungi sseetilayiti ey’ekikugu mu 1957 , setilayiti ezisukka mu nkumi kkumi zizze zeetooloola Ensi. Mu mulembe guno omupya, abayimbi bafunye engeri gye bayinza okugaziya enkola yaabwe era obwengula bufuuse ekika kya kanvaasi ekipya. Nga tulina ekyo, ebibuuzo ebikulu ebikwata ku byobufuzi by’okunoonyereza mu bwengula bizze bibaawo - wadde ng’ettaka eddala lingi tebinnaba kubikkibwako.

leonov.text: Ekifaananyi ekyasooka okutondebwa mu bwengula kyali kifaananyi ky’enjuba ng’evaayo waggulu w’ensi, ekyakolebwa omukugu mu by’omu bwengula Omurusiya Alexei Leonov bwe yali ku mmeeri ya Voskhod 2 mu 1965 .
leonov.caption: Ekintu ekisooka eky’obuyiiya ekyatondebwa mu bwengula, n’ekkalaamu Alexei Leonov ze yakozesa okukikuba. Ekifaananyi: Museum of the Yuri Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Center

moonMuseum.paragraph1: Nga wayise emyaka esatu, Moon Museum , ekipande ekitono ennyo ekya ceramic ekigambibwa nti kyatuuka ku Mwezi nga kiriko ebiwandiiko by’abayiiya mukaaga abasinga okumanyika mu Amerika mu kiseera ekyo: Robert Rauschenberg , David Novros , John Chamberlain , Claes Oldenburg , Forrest Myers ne Andy Warhol .
moonMuseum.caption1: Ekifaananyi kya Moon Museum okuva mu kiwandiiko ekyasooka ekya New York Times. Engalo ensajja eziba ekifaananyi kya Warhol.
moonMuseum.paragraph2: Warhol kye yakola mu ngeri ey’okusikiriza - waggulu ku kkono - kyafuula pulojekiti eno okusoomoozebwa eri emikutu gy’empuliziganya mu kiseera ekyo.
moonMuseum.caption2: Ekifaananyi New York Times kye yasalawo okufulumya, ng’ebifaananyi eby’obuyiiya birabika wansi n’ekifaananyi kya Andy Warhol mu nsonda eya waggulu ku kkono.

fallenAstronaut.text: Mu 1971 , ekibumbe ekitono ekya aluminiyamu ekifaanana ng'omuntu ekiyitibwa Fallen Astronaut kyateekebwa ku Mwezi omukugu mu by'omu bwengula ow'e Apollo 15 David Scott . Omuyiiya w’e Bubirigi Paul Van Hoeydonck yagenderera, n’ekitundu kino, okujjukira abagenda mu bwengula n’abagenda mu bwengula abafudde mu nkulaakulana y’okunoonyereza mu bwengula.
fallenAstronaut.caption: Okulaba ekipande ky’ekijjukizo ekyalekebwa ku mwezi mu kifo Hadley-Apennine we baasimbula.

pioneerVoyager.text: Mu myaka gya 1970 , ebipande byombi ebya Pioneer Plaques ne Voyager Probes byassaawo emisomo emipya egy’okukola ebifaananyi mu bwengula. Nga basitudde ebipande bya aluminiyamu ebikoleddwa mu zaabu nga biriko obubaka obulabika okuva ku Nsi eri abatembeeyi abalala bonna abayinza okubusanga mu biseera eby’omu maaso eby’ewala, baalaga obulamu bw’omuntu mu bintu byabwo ebisinga obukulu.
pioneerVoyager.caption: Ebipande bya Pioneer 10 ne 11, ebyatwalibwa mu bwengula obuwanvu mu myaka gya 1970.

dove.text: Mu 1990 , Brazil yaleka akabonero kaayo ku kitundu kino ne DOVE/OSCAR-17 , satellite ey’amagezi ey’amateur ey’amaanyi amangi ag’ebitontome. Newankubadde omutonzi waayo teyeetwala nga muyimbi, yali kaweefube wa bitontome nnyo: yakwata amaloboozi g’abaana nga basaba emirembe n’agaweereza eri abayiiya ba leediyo abasoba mu nkumi bbiri mu nsi yonna, n’ekyusa CubeSat eyasooka okugifuula omulimu gw’amaloboozi ogw’omuggundu.
dove.caption: DOVE/OSCAR-17, setilayiti ya Brazil ey’ebitontome ng’etambuza amaloboozi g’abaana olw’emirembe, 1990.

lastPictures.text: Mu 2012 , omuyiiya Trevor Paglen yatongoza "The Last Pictures" , disiki eriko ebifaananyi ebitonotono (micro-etched disc) nga mulimu ebifaananyi 100 ebiyungiddwa ku setilayiti y'empuliziganya eya Echostar XVI mu nkulungo y'ensi. Yakolebwa okuwangaala obuwumbi n’obuwumbi bw’emyaka, era egendereddwamu okuwangaala okusinga embuga z’abantu ng’ekintu eky’eby’okukuula eby’edda mu biseera eby’omu maaso eby’ewala.
lastPictures.caption: The Last Pictures, disiki eriko micro-etched eyakolebwa okuwangaala okusinga abantu, yatongozebwa mu 2012.

ulises.text: Mu 2015 , ekibiina kya Colectivo Espacial Mexicano (Mexican Space Collective) kyatongoza Ulises I , nanosatellite eyalowoozebwako nga opera ey’endowooza wansi w’obulagirizi bw’omuyiiya Juan José Díaz Infante Casasús . Setilayiti eno yatwalibwa mu stratosphere ku bbaatule mu kiseera kya Feria del Libro de Guadalajara. Ekoleddwa okubwatuka ku ssaawa nga nnya n’okukka nga ekozesa parachute.
ulises.caption: Ulises I, opera ya setilayiti ey’endowooza eya Colectivo Espacial Mexicano.

artsat.text: Wabula mu 2014 , sseetilayiti eyasooka ey’ekikugu yokka n’etongozebwa. Pulojekiti ya Yunivasite y’e Tokyo eya ARTSAT-1 Invader yasindika ebikwata ku kifo ku nsi ebyakozesebwa mu kuteeka ebifaananyi n’okutonda ennyimba.
artsat.caption1: ARTSAT-1 Invader framework ne sipeeya ezaasigala ku Nsi.
artsat.caption2: mission [SPACE x ART] − omwoleso gw’okusukka Cosmologies ogwategekebwa mu Museum of Contemporary Art Tokyo

kac.text: Omuyiiya w'omulembe guno Omubrazil ne Amerika Eduardo Kac akoze kinene mu by'emikono mu bwengula ng'ayita mu nkolagana ne NASA ne SpaceX . "Inner Telescope" ye ( 2017 ), eyatondebwa n'omukugu mu by'omu bwengula Omufaransa Thomas Pesquet , yavaamu ekibumbe ekyakolebwa ku mmeeri ya International Space Station .
kac.caption: Inner Telescope ku International Space Station, eyatondebwawo n’omukugu mu by’omu bwengula Omufaransa Thomas Pesquet, 2017.

enoch.text: Mu 2018 , passive CubeSat eyazimbibwa nga art project yatongozebwa mu orbit. Yakolebwa omukugu mu by’enteekateeka ow’e Bahamas Tavares Strachan , Enoch erimu ekibbo kya zaabu ekiweza karat 24 nga kiriko ekifaananyi ky’omusajja Omufirika-Amerika eyasooka okutambula mu bwengula, Robert Henry Lawrence Jr .
enoch.caption: ENOCH (ekitundu eky’okulaga), 2015-2017. R Tavares Strachan, ekifaananyi R Abakolagana ne Museum/LACMA.

orbitalReflector.text: Mu mwaka gwe gumu, Trevor Paglen’s Orbital Reflector nayo yatongozebwa ng’ekibumbe ekissiddwa mu CubeSat etakola. Omulimu guno gwali gwa buyiiya nga gugendereddwamu okukyusa engeri gye tulabamu ekifo kyaffe mu nsi. Teyassibwa mu nkola mu butuufu. Wadde nga teyaggulwawo nga bwe yategekebwa, yaleetawo emboozi enkulu era n’efuna eby’okuddamu eby’obwagazi okuva mu bakugu mu by’emmunyeenye, bannassaayansi, emikutu gy’amawulire, abasomesa, abayizi, n’abantu bonna mu nsi yonna, ne kiraga nti ebifaananyi ebiwangudde tebyetaagisa kuba bya buwanguzi mu by’ekikugu.
orbitalReflector.caption: Okulaga kwa digito okw’ekitunuulizi ky’enkulungo, 2018

others.text: Abayiiya abalala bangi bakoze kinene mu mulimu gw’okukola ebifaananyi mu bwengula, buli omu n’aleeta endowooza ez’enjawulo mu kunoonyereza kwe. Pulojekiti ezeeyoleka mulimu okunoonyereza kwa Sarah Jane Pell okw’abayiiya abagenda mu bwengula nga banoonyereza ku nkola y’abantu mu mbeera ezisukkiridde; Pulojekiti ya Agnes Meyer-Brandis eya Moon Goose Analogue eyeekenneenya ennyiriri z’ebyafaayo n’ez’omulembe ez’okunoonyereza ku bwengula; Enteekateeka ya Nahum eya AstroArts eyamba okugezesa microgravity mu by’ekikugu; n’ekibumbe kya Arthur Woods ekya Cosmic Dancer , ekibumbe ekyasooka okwolesebwa mu bwengula ku siteegi ya Mir mu 1993.

orbitalTemple.text: Mu 2025 , oluvannyuma lw’emyaka 4 egy’okunoonyereza n’okukulaakulanya, omuyiiya Omubrazil Edson Pavoni n’ekibinja ky’abakolagana nabo abakola emirimu egy’enjawulo bajja kutongoza Orbital Temple , satellite y’ebyemikono eyeetabamu eyita omuntu yenna mu nsi okusindika amannya mu nkulungo, okutondawo ekijjukizo ekizingiramu abantu bonna okusukka ensalo.
orbitalTemple.caption: Yeekaalu ya Orbital ku Mercosul Bienal. Ekifaananyi: Clara Marques

imageAlts.artsatArt: Ebifaananyi ebikoleddwa okuva mu data ya ARTSAT-1
imageAlts.innerTelescope: Ekyuma ekitunula munda ekya Eduardo Kac
imageAlts.enoch: Ekitundu kya Tavares Strachan eky’okwolesebwa ekya ENOCH
imageAlts.orbitalReflector: Ekintu ekiyitibwa Trevor Paglen ekiyitibwa Orbital Reflector
